WHAT AWAITS YOU IN OUR FOOTBALL CLUB?

three conditions for the development of a football player in a club:
Comfortable and diligent training process
Regular football matches in amateur leagues
of St. Petersburg
Friendly team and increased competition in the team

HISTORY OF MIRANDOL FOOTBALL CLUB

Football club Mirandol was founded in 2016 by graduates Peter the Great St. Petersburg Polytechnic University.


Students of the Civil Engineering Faculty participated in the club's birth and began their football journey with university competitions within the university.

In the history of the club there were such awards as:

1. Winners of the student tournament within the university between faculties.
2.OLE Cup Winners First Division North West 2021
3. Northern League Cup Winner 2019/2020
4. Member of the SFL Zenit Premier League 2021

THE MAIN TOURNAMENTS IN WHICH THE TEAM PARTICIPATES
